her favorite cake | with the whiped cream icing was made .
this is going to be one spoiled little girl !
output.sentences: My best friend is having a baby girl, and it is so exciting to throw her a baby shower.
My friend was so surprised that she was going to start crying, but we started pouring apple cider and she was very happy.
I got her a sheet cake with whipped buttercream icing, and it is her favorite.
Then we played games like "Name That Baby" and she had so much fun.
She thought that we all went overboard on the gifts, certain that she would have a very spoiled little girl.
